resources.string:
How to play?
 1. Swipe the trajectory of the shot from the ball to the goal with your finger.
 2. Tap anywhere on the screen to stop the accuracy bar.
 3. A goal is counted if the kick was in the area of the goal and if the pointer on the scale is in the green zone.
 4. The game ends with any failed hit.
 Try to score as many goals as possible)
